name: Idle Champions: Mind Flayer Viconia Skin & Feat Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Viconia (if you don't already own them) Mind Flayer Viconia Skin An Epic Feat for Viconia 7 Gold Viconia Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
